title: Why the Water Is Sweet Where the River Meets the Sea
description: Andie, a young girl with a close relationship to a river, approaches a beautiful spot by the water on her last Sunday as a child. Reflecting on the passage of time and the limitations of dreams, Andie grapples with the complexities of growing up and the enduring power of friendship. This coming-of-age story explores the beauty and bittersweet nature of change.
author: Enrique Posner
